blocks.name: predeq123
blocks.content: Equality theorem for the predecessor class. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 13-Jun-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm predeq123(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5)), wceq(cpred(c0, c2, c4), cpred(c1, c3, c5)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cpred(c0, c2, c4), cpred(c1, c3, c5), cin(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(c4))), cin(c3, cima(ccnv(c1), csn(c5))), w3a(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5)))
  ineq12d(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(c4)), c3, cima(ccnv(c1), csn(c5)), w3a(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5)))
  simp2(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5))
  imaeq12d(ccnv(c0), csn(c4), ccnv(c1), csn(c5), w3a(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5)))
  3ad2ant1(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5), wceq(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c1)))
  cnveq(c0, c1)
  3ad2ant3(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c4, c5), wceq(csn(c4), csn(c5)))
  sneq(c4, c5)
  df-pred(c0, c2, c4)
  df-pred(c1, c3, c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm predeq123(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3 ∧ c4 = c5)→ Pred(c0, c2, c4)= Pred(c1, c3, c5))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(Pred(c0, c2, c4), Pred(c1, c3, c5), (c2 ⋂(`' c0 " { c4 })), (c3 ⋂(`' c1 " { c5 })), (c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3 ∧ c4 = c5))
  ineq12d(c2, (`' c0 " { c4 }), c3, (`' c1 " { c5 }), (c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3 ∧ c4 = c5))
  simp2(c0 = c1, c2 = c3, c4 = c5)
  imaeq12d(`' c0, { c4 }, `' c1, { c5 }, (c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3 ∧ c4 = c5))
  3ad2ant1(c0 = c1, c2 = c3, c4 = c5, `' c0 = `' c1)
  cnveq(c0, c1)
  3ad2ant3(c0 = c1, c2 = c3, c4 = c5, { c4 } = { c5 })
  sneq(c4, c5)
  df-pred(c0, c2, c4)
  df-pred(c1, c3, c5)
}

blocks.name: sspred
blocks.content: Another subset/predecessor class relationship. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 6-Feb-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm sspred(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(cpred(c2, c1, c3), c0)), wceq(cpred(c2, c1, c3), cpred(c2, c0, c3)))
} = {
  syl2anb(wss(c0, c1), wss(cpred(c2, c1, c3), c0), wceq(cpred(c2, c1, c3), cpred(c2, c0, c3)), wceq(cin(c1, c0), c0), wceq(cin(cin(c1, c0), cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3))), cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3)))))
  sseqin2(c0, c1)
  3bitri(wss(cpred(c2, c1, c3), c0), wceq(cin(cin(c1, c0), cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3))), cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3)))), wss(cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3))), c0), wceq(cin(cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3))), c0), cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3)))))
  sseq1i(cpred(c2, c1, c3), c0, cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3))))
  df-ss(cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3))), c0)
  eqeq1i(cin(cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3))), c0), cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3))), cin(cin(c1, c0), cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3))))
  in32(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3)), c0)
  eqcomd(cpred(c2, c1, c3), cpred(c2, c0, c3), wa(wceq(cin(c1, c0), c0), wceq(cin(cin(c1, c0), cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3))), cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3))))))
  3eqtr4g(cpred(c2, c0, c3), cpred(c2, c1, c3), cin(c0, cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3))), cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3))), wa(wceq(cin(c1, c0), c0), wceq(cin(cin(c1, c0), cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3))), cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3))))))
  biimpa(wceq(cin(c1, c0), c0), wceq(cin(cin(c1, c0), cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3))), cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3)))), wceq(cin(c0, cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3))), cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3)))))
  eqeq1d(cin(cin(c1, c0), cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3))), cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3))), cin(c0, cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3))), wceq(cin(c1, c0), c0))
  ineq1(cin(c1, c0), c0, cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c3)))
  df-pred(c2, c0, c3)
  df-pred(c2, c1, c3)
}

blocks.name: dfpred3g
blocks.content: An alternate definition of predecessor class when ` X ` is a set. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 13-Jun-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfpred3g(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cpred(c2, c3, c0), crab(s0, c3, wbr(cv(s0), c2, c0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, wceq(cpred(c2, c3, c0), crab(s0, c3, wbr(cv(s0), c2, c0))), wceq(cpred(c2, c3, cv(hs0)), crab(s0, c3, wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(hs0)))))
  eqeq12d(cpred(c2, c3, cv(hs0)), crab(s0, c3, wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(hs0))), cpred(c2, c3, c0), crab(s0, c3, wbr(cv(s0), c2, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  predeq3(cv(hs0), c0, c2, c3)
  rabbidv(s0, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c2, c0))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0), c2)
  dfpred3(s0, c2, c3, cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cpred(c2, c3, c0), crab(s0, c3, wbr(cv(s0), c2, c0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dfpred3g(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → Pred(c2, c3, c0)= { s0 ∈ c3 | s0[c2]c0 })
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, Pred(c2, c3, c0)= { s0 ∈ c3 | s0[c2]c0 }, Pred(c2, c3, hs0)= { s0 ∈ c3 | s0[c2]hs0 })
  eqeq12d(Pred(c2, c3, hs0), { s0 ∈ c3 | s0[c2]hs0 }, Pred(c2, c3, c0), { s0 ∈ c3 | s0[c2]c0 }, hs0 = c0)
  predeq3(hs0, c0, c2, c3)
  rabbidv(s0, c3, hs0 = c0, s0[c2]hs0, s0[c2]c0)
  breq2(hs0, c0, s0, c2)
  dfpred3(s0, c2, c3, hs0)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(Pred(c2, c3, c0)= { s0 ∈ c3 | s0[c2]c0 })
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: elpredim
blocks.content: Membership in a predecessor class - implicative version. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 9-May-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm elpredim(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cpred(c1, c2, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3))
  -| wcel(c3, universe)
} = {
  simplbiim(wcel(c0, cpred(c1, c2, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c0, cima(ccnv(c1), csn(c3))))
  elin2(c0, cpred(c1, c2, c3), c2, cima(ccnv(c1), csn(c3)))
  df-pred(c1, c2, c3)
  sylibr(wcel(c0, cima(ccnv(c1), csn(c3))), wbr(c0, c1, c3), wcel(cop(c0, c3), c1))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cima(ccnv(c1), csn(c3))), wcel(cop(c0, c3), c1))
  mpan(wcel(c0, cima(ccnv(c1), csn(c3))), wb(wcel(c0, cima(ccnv(c1), csn(c3))), wcel(cop(c0, c3), c1)), wcel(c3, universe))
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c0, cima(ccnv(c1), csn(c3)))), wcel(c0, cima(ccnv(c1), csn(c3))), wcel(cop(c0, c3), c1), wcel(cop(c3, c0), ccnv(c1)))
  elimasng(c3, universe, c0, cima(ccnv(c1), csn(c3)), ccnv(c1))
  opelcnvg(c3, universe, c0, cima(ccnv(c1), csn(c3)), c1)
  df-br(c0, c1, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elpredim(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Pred(c1, c2, c3)→ c0[c1]c3)
  ⊣ c3 ∈ 𝕌
} = {
  simplbiim(c0 ∈ Pred(c1, c2, c3), c0[c1]c3, c0 ∈ c2, c0 ∈(`' c1 " { c3 }))
  elin2(c0, Pred(c1, c2, c3), c2, (`' c1 " { c3 }))
  df-pred(c1, c2, c3)
  sylibr(c0 ∈(`' c1 " { c3 }), c0[c1]c3, < c0, c3 > ∈ c1)
  ibi(c0 ∈(`' c1 " { c3 }), < c0, c3 > ∈ c1)
  mpan(c0 ∈(`' c1 " { c3 }), (c0 ∈(`' c1 " { c3 })↔ < c0, c3 > ∈ c1), c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  bitrd((c3 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c0 ∈(`' c1 " { c3 })), c0 ∈(`' c1 " { c3 }), < c0, c3 > ∈ c1, < c3, c0 > ∈ `' c1)
  elimasng(c3, universe, c0, (`' c1 " { c3 }), `' c1)
  opelcnvg(c3, universe, c0, (`' c1 " { c3 }), c1)
  df-br(c0, c1, c3)
}

blocks.name: dffr4
blocks.content: Alternate definition of well-founded relation. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 2-Feb-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm dffr4(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wfr(c0, c1), wal(s0, wi(wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), emptycls)), wrex(s1, cv(s0), wceq(cpred(c0, cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  bitr4i(wfr(c0, c1), wal(s0, wi(wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), emptycls)), wrex(s1, cv(s0), wceq(cpred(c0, cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)))), wal(s0, wi(wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), emptycls)), wrex(s1, cv(s0), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s1)))), emptycls)))))
  dffr3(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  albii(s0, wi(wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), emptycls)), wrex(s1, cv(s0), wceq(cpred(c0, cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))), wi(wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), emptycls)), wrex(s1, cv(s0), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s1)))), emptycls))))
  imbi2i(wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), emptycls)), wrex(s1, cv(s0), wceq(cpred(c0, cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)), wrex(s1, cv(s0), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s1)))), emptycls)))
  rexbii(s1, cv(s0), wceq(cpred(c0, cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s1)))), emptycls))
  eqeq1i(cpred(c0, cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls, cin(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s1)))))
  df-pred(c0, cv(s0), cv(s1))
}

blocks.name: predpo
blocks.content: Property of the precessor class for partial orderings. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 28-Apr-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm predpo(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wi(wcel(c3, cpred(c0, c1, c2)), wss(cpred(c0, c1, c3), cpred(c0, c1, c2))))
} = {
  mpdi(wa(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, cpred(c0, c1, c2)), wss(cpred(c0, c1, c3), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c1))
  predel(c3, c0, c1, c2)
  3exp(wa(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, cpred(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c1), wss(cpred(c0, c1, c3), cpred(c0, c1, c2)))
  ssrdv(hs0, cpred(c0, c1, c3), cpred(c0, c1, c2), w3a(wa(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, cpred(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c1)))
  3imtr4d(w3a(wa(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, cpred(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2)))
  imdistand(w3a(wa(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, cpred(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c3), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2))
  3imp(wa(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, cpred(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c1), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c3), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2))))
  com23(wa(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, cpred(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c1), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c3), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2))))
  ex(wa(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, c1), wi(wcel(c3, cpred(c0, c1, c2)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c3), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2)))))
  sylbid(wa(wa(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(c3, cpred(c0, c1, c2)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c3), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2))), wbr(c3, c0, c2))
  adantll(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wb(wcel(c3, cpred(c0, c1, c2)), wbr(c3, c0, c2)))
  elpredg(c2, c1, c3, c1, c0)
  com14(wa(wa(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, c1)), wbr(c3, c0, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c3), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2))
  ex(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wi(wa(wa(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2))))
  com13(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wa(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2))
  imp31(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2))))
  com24(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2)))
  3exp2(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2)))
  potr(c0, c1, cv(hs0), c3, c2)
  3ad2ant3(wa(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, cpred(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c1), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c3))))
  elpred(c3, c1, cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  3ad2ant1(wa(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, cpred(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c1), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2))))
  adantl(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cpred(c0, c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2))))
  elpred(c2, c1, cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(cpred(c0, c1, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(cpred(c0, c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wa(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, cpred(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm predpo(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⪯ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1)→(c3 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, c2)→ Pred(c0, c1, c3)⊆ Pred(c0, c1, c2)))
} = {
  mpdi((c0 ⪯ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1), c3 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, c2), Pred(c0, c1, c3)⊆ Pred(c0, c1, c2), c3 ∈ c1)
  predel(c3, c0, c1, c2)
  3exp((c0 ⪯ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1), c3 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, c2), c3 ∈ c1, Pred(c0, c1, c3)⊆ Pred(c0, c1, c2))

thm predbrg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cpred(c3, c4, c0))), wbr(c2, c3, c0))
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cpred(c3, c4, c0)), wbr(c2, c3, c0))
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, wi(wcel(c2, cpred(c3, c4, c0)), wbr(c2, c3, c0)), wi(wcel(c2, cpred(c3, c4, cv(hs0))), wbr(c2, c3, cv(hs0))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c2, cpred(c3, c4, cv(hs0))), wbr(c2, c3, cv(hs0)), wcel(c2, cpred(c3, c4, c0)), wbr(c2, c3, c0))
  eleq2d(c2, cpred(c3, c4, cv(hs0)), cpred(c3, c4, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  predeq3(cv(hs0), c0, c3, c4)
  breq2(cv(hs0), c0, c2, c3)
  elpredim(c2, c3, c4, cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c2, cpred(c3, c4, c0)), wbr(c2, c3, c0)))
}

} = {
  imp(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ Pred(c3, c4, c0), c2[c3]c0)
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, (c2 ∈ Pred(c3, c4, c0)→ c2[c3]c0), (c2 ∈ Pred(c3, c4, hs0)→ c2[c3]hs0))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c0, c2 ∈ Pred(c3, c4, hs0), c2[c3]hs0, c2 ∈ Pred(c3, c4, c0), c2[c3]c0)
  eleq2d(c2, Pred(c3, c4, hs0), Pred(c3, c4, c0), hs0 = c0)

  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((c2 ∈ Pred(c3, c4, c0)→ c2[c3]c0))
}

thm setlikespec(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

} = {

  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wse(c2, c1), wceq(crab(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c0)), cpred(c2, c1, c0)))
  syl6reqr(crab(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c0)), cpred(c2, c1, c0), cab(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c0))), wcel(c0, c1))
  abbi2dv(hs0, cpred(c2, c1, c0), wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c0)))
  elpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0), c2, c1)
  vex(hs0)
  df-rab(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c0))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, c1), wse(c2, c1), wcel(crab(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c0)), universe))
  seex(hs0, c2, c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cpred(c2, c1, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))

  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

thm predidm(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

blocks.name: predep
blocks.content: The predecessor under the epsilon relationship is equivalent to an intersection. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 27-Mar-2011.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm predep(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cpred(cep, c2, c0), cin(c2, c0)))
} = {
  syl5eq(cpred(cep, c2, c0), cin(c2, c0), cin(c2, cima(ccnv(cep), csn(c0))), wcel(c0, c1))
  df-pred(cep, c2, c0)
  ineq2d(c2, cima(ccnv(cep), csn(c0)), c0, wcel(c0, c1))
  syl5eq(cima(ccnv(cep), csn(c0)), c0, cab(hs0, wbr(c0, ccnv(cep), cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, c1))
  ax-mp(wceq(cima(ccnv(cep), csn(c0)), cab(hs0, wbr(c0, ccnv(cep), cv(hs0)))), wrel(ccnv(cep)))
  relcnv(cep)
  relimasn(hs0, ccnv(cep), c0)
  abbi1dv(hs0, c0, wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c0, ccnv(cep), cv(hs0)))
  bitrd(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c0, ccnv(cep), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cep, c0))
  elvd(hs0, wcel(c0, c1), wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(cep), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cep, c0)))
  brcnvg(c0, c1, cv(hs0), universe, cep)
  epelg(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(ccnv(cep))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))
}

thm predep(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → Pred(∈, c2, c0)=(c2 ⋂ c0))
} = {

  df-pred(cep, c2, c0)

  ax-mp((`' ∈ " { c0 })= { hs0 | c0[`' ∈]hs0 }, Rel(`' ∈))
  relcnv(cep)
  relimasn(hs0, `' ∈, c0)
  abbi1dv(hs0, c0, c0 ∈ c1, c0[`' ∈]hs0)
  bitrd(c0 ∈ c1, c0[`' ∈]hs0, hs0 ∈ c0, hs0[∈]c0)
  elvd(hs0, c0 ∈ c1, (c0[`' ∈]hs0 ↔ hs0[∈]c0))

  epelg(c0, c1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(`' ∈)

  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ c1)

  vtoclg(hs0, c3, c0, wi(wa(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wss(cpred(c2, c1, cv(s0)), c0))), wi(wcel(c3, c0), wceq(cpred(c2, c0, c3), cpred(c2, c1, c3)))), wi(wa(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wss(cpred(c2, c1, cv(s0)), c0))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cpred(c2, c0, cv(hs0)), cpred(c2, c1, cv(hs0))))))

  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cpred(c2, c0, cv(hs0)), cpred(c2, c1, cv(hs0))), wcel(c3, c0), wceq(cpred(c2, c0, c3), cpred(c2, c1, c3)))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c3, c0)
  eqeq12d(cpred(c2, c0, cv(hs0)), cpred(c2, c1, cv(hs0)), cpred(c2, c0, c3), cpred(c2, c1, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  predeq3(cv(hs0), c3, c2, c0)

  eqssd(cpred(c2, c0, cv(hs0)), cpred(c2, c1, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wss(cpred(c2, c1, cv(s0)), c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  ad2antrr(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wss(cpred(c2, c1, cv(s0)), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cpred(c2, c0, cv(hs0)), cpred(c2, c1, cv(hs0))))
  predpredss(c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0))
  adantll(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wss(cpred(c2, c1, cv(s0)), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cpred(c2, c1, cv(hs0)), cpred(c2, c0, cv(hs0))))
  ssrdv(hs1, cpred(c2, c1, cv(hs0)), cpred(c2, c0, cv(hs0)), wa(wral(s0, c0, wss(cpred(c2, c1, cv(s0)), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  mpbird(wa(wral(s0, c0, wss(cpred(c2, c1, cv(s0)), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wi(wcel(cv(hs1), cpred(c2, c1, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs1), cpred(c2, c0, cv(hs0)))), wi(wcel(cv(hs1), cpred(c2, c1, cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0)))))
  jca2(wa(wral(s0, c0, wss(cpred(c2, c1, cv(s0)), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cpred(c2, c1, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0)))
  sseld(cv(hs1), cpred(c2, c1, cv(hs0)), c0, wa(wral(s0, c0, wss(cpred(c2, c1, cv(s0)), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))

  sseq1d(cpred(c2, c1, cv(s0)), c0, cpred(c2, c1, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))

  imbi2d(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), cpred(c2, c1, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs1), cpred(c2, c0, cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0))))

  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wa(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wss(cpred(c2, c1, cv(s0)), c0))), wi(wcel(c3, c0), wceq(cpred(c2, c0, c3), cpred(c2, c1, c3)))))

thm preddowncl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, Pred(c2, c1, s0)⊆ c0))→(c3 ∈ c0 → Pred(c2, c0, c3)= Pred(c2, c1, c3)))

} = {
  pm2.43b((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, Pred(c2, c1, s0)⊆ c0)), c3 ∈ c0, Pred(c2, c0, c3)= Pred(c2, c1, c3))
  vtoclg(hs0, c3, c0, ((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, Pred(c2, c1, s0)⊆ c0))→(c3 ∈ c0 → Pred(c2, c0, c3)= Pred(c2, c1, c3))), ((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, Pred(c2, c1, s0)⊆ c0))→(hs0 ∈ c0 → Pred(c2, c0, hs0)= Pred(c2, c1, hs0))))
  imbi2d(hs0 = c3, (c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, Pred(c2, c1, s0)⊆ c0)), (hs0 ∈ c0 → Pred(c2, c0, hs0)= Pred(c2, c1, hs0)), (c3 ∈ c0 → Pred(c2, c0, c3)= Pred(c2, c1, c3)))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c3, hs0 ∈ c0, Pred(c2, c0, hs0)= Pred(c2, c1, hs0), c3 ∈ c0, Pred(c2, c0, c3)= Pred(c2, c1, c3))
  eleq1(hs0, c3, c0)
  eqeq12d(Pred(c2, c0, hs0), Pred(c2, c1, hs0), Pred(c2, c0, c3), Pred(c2, c1, c3), hs0 = c3)
  predeq3(hs0, c3, c2, c0)
  predeq3(hs0, c3, c2, c1)
  ex((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, Pred(c2, c1, s0)⊆ c0)), hs0 ∈ c0, Pred(c2, c0, hs0)= Pred(c2, c1, hs0))
  eqssd(Pred(c2, c0, hs0), Pred(c2, c1, hs0), ((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, Pred(c2, c1, s0)⊆ c0))∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  ad2antrr(c0 ⊆ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, Pred(c2, c1, s0)⊆ c0), hs0 ∈ c0, Pred(c2, c0, hs0)⊆ Pred(c2, c1, hs0))
  predpredss(c0, c1, c2, hs0)

  ssrdv(hs1, Pred(c2, c1, hs0), Pred(c2, c0, hs0), (∀(s0 ∈ c0, Pred(c2, c1, s0)⊆ c0)∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  mpbird((∀(s0 ∈ c0, Pred(c2, c1, s0)⊆ c0)∧ hs0 ∈ c0), (hs1 ∈ Pred(c2, c1, hs0)→ hs1 ∈ Pred(c2, c0, hs0)), (hs1 ∈ Pred(c2, c1, hs0)→(hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1[c2]hs0)))

  imbi2d(hs0 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ Pred(c2, c1, hs0), hs1 ∈ Pred(c2, c0, hs0), (hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1[c2]hs0))
  elpred(hs0, c0, hs1, c2, c0)

blocks.name: predpoirr
blocks.content: Given a partial ordering, ` X ` is not a member of its predecessor class. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Apr-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm predpoirr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wpo(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c2, cpred(c0, c1, c2))))
} = {
  pm2.61d1(wpo(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c2, cpred(c0, c1, c2))), wcel(c2, c1))
  pm2.43b(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wn(wcel(c2, cpred(c0, c1, c2))))
  expd(wcel(c2, c1), wpo(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wn(wcel(c2, cpred(c0, c1, c2))))
  syl5ibr(wcel(c2, c1), wa(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wn(wcel(c2, cpred(c0, c1, c2))), wn(wbr(c2, c0, c2)))
  poirr(c0, c1, c2)
  notbid(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c2, cpred(c0, c1, c2)), wbr(c2, c0, c2))
  anidms(wcel(c2, c1), wb(wcel(c2, cpred(c0, c1, c2)), wbr(c2, c0, c2)))
  elpredg(c2, c1, c2, c1, c0)
  con3i(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c2, cpred(c0, c1, c2)))
  predel(c2, c0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm predpoirr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⪯ c1 → ¬ c2 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, c2))
} = {
  pm2.61d1(c0 ⪯ c1, ¬ c2 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, c2), c2 ∈ c1)
  pm2.43b(c0 ⪯ c1, c2 ∈ c1, ¬ c2 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, c2))
  expd(c2 ∈ c1, c0 ⪯ c1, c2 ∈ c1, ¬ c2 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, c2))
  syl5ibr(c2 ∈ c1, (c0 ⪯ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1), ¬ c2 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, c2), ¬ c2[c0]c2)
  poirr(c0, c1, c2)
  notbid(c2 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, c2), c2[c0]c2)
  anidms(c2 ∈ c1, (c2 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, c2)↔ c2[c0]c2))
  elpredg(c2, c1, c2, c1, c0)
  con3i(c2 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, c2))
  predel(c2, c0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: predfrirr
blocks.content: Given a well-founded relationship, ` X ` is not a member of its predecessor class. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 22-Apr-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm predfrirr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

} = {

  pm2.43b(wfr(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wn(wcel(c2, cpred(c0, c1, c2))))
  expd(wcel(c2, c1), wfr(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wn(wcel(c2, cpred(c0, c1, c2))))
  syl5ibr(wcel(c2, c1), wa(wfr(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wn(wcel(c2, cpred(c0, c1, c2))), wn(wbr(c2, c0, c2)))
  frirr(c0, c1, c2)
  notbid(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c2, cpred(c0, c1, c2)), wbr(c2, c0, c2))
  anidms(wcel(c2, c1), wb(wcel(c2, cpred(c0, c1, c2)), wbr(c2, c0, c2)))
  elpredg(c2, c1, c2, c1, c0)

blocks.pretty:
thm predfrirr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0[Fr]c1 → ¬ c2 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, c2))
} = {
  pm2.61d1(c0[Fr]c1, ¬ c2 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, c2), c2 ∈ c1)
  pm2.43b(c0[Fr]c1, c2 ∈ c1, ¬ c2 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, c2))
  expd(c2 ∈ c1, c0[Fr]c1, c2 ∈ c1, ¬ c2 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, c2))
  syl5ibr(c2 ∈ c1, (c0[Fr]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1), ¬ c2 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, c2), ¬ c2[c0]c2)
  frirr(c0, c1, c2)
  notbid(c2 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, c2), c2[c0]c2)
  anidms(c2 ∈ c1, (c2 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, c2)↔ c2[c0]c2))
  elpredg(c2, c1, c2, c1, c0)
  con3i(c2 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, c2))
  predel(c2, c0, c1, c2)
}
